class AE_object(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder='AE', pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)

        self.schemas['DMAEStudent'] = [
                                        ['SKAEStudentId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKSourceStudentId', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['PersistentStudentId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['StudentFirstName', 'string', 'hash'],
                                        ['StudentSurname', 'string', 'hash'],
                                        ['DOB', 'date', 'hash'],

                                        ]

                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],

                                        ['ScdReason', 'string', 'no-op']

                                        ]

                                 

    def ingest(self):
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMAEStudent', self.schemas['DMAEStudent'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKAEStudentId')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMAEStudentDescription', self.schemas['DMAEStudentDescription'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKAEStudentDescriptionId')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMAEStudentResultId', self.schemas['DMAEStudentResultId'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKAEStudentResultId')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMAESubjectCourse', self.schemas['DMAESubjectCourse'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKAESubjectCourseId')

        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMFACTAEDC', self.schemas['DMFACTAEDC'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKAEDC')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMFACTAEDCStrengths', self.schemas['DMFACTAEDCStrengths'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKAEDCStrengths')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMFactStudentAEResult', self.schemas['DMFactStudentAEResult'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKFactStudentAEResultId')



ae_object = AE_object()
